originalText.text: A typical bus stop. No place to sit, just stand around contemplating existence while watching people walk towards the ferry or towards fidi. People waiting for 28 complain that there are too many 27s. People waiting for 27’s complain there are too many 28’s. Everyone complains that Staten island has the most buses. People don’t seem to agree on how to line up for the bus. Some gather on the west side of the bus stop sign post. Others gaggle from the east. When the bus arrives everyone converges at the same time like cattle. First ones to the door go first. Most people are polite and let those who were there before them go first. Others don’t care about courtesy and just b-line for the door.

text.text: A typical bus stop. No place to sit, just stand around contemplating existence while watching people walk towards the ferry or towards fidi. People waiting for 28 complain that there are too many 27s. People waiting for 27’s complain there are too many 28’s. Everyone complains that Staten island has the most buses. People don’t seem to agree on how to line up for the bus. Some gather on the west side of the bus stop sign post. Others gaggle from the east. When the bus arrives everyone converges at the same time like cattle. First ones to the door go first. Most people are polite and let those who were there before them go first. Others don’t care about courtesy and just b-line for the door.
